text: Eleonora Salvatore González (1 October 1975 - 23 January 2017), better known as Bimba Bosé, was an Italian-born Spanish model, actress and singer. In 2007, she recorded "Como un Lobo" with her uncle Miguel Bosé. She was also a runway model in London, Paris, New York City and Milan for designers such as Miguel Adrover, John Galliano and Yohji Yamamoto. She was born in Rome. Her grandmother was Lucia Bosè. Bosé died from breast cancer on 23 January 2017 in Madrid. She was 41. ==Filmography== * El cónsul de Sodoma (2010) * Run a way (2012) * La que se avecina (2014) * Julieta (2016) * Levántate All Stars (2016) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1975 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Actors from Madrid Category:Actors from Rome Category:Singers from Rome Category:Cancer deaths in Spain Category:Deaths from breast cancer Category:Spanish models Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish singers Category:Spanish television actors
title: Bimba Bosé
